info.name: Fantasy Wars

info.helpText:
Choose your troops by adding them to your holders or get random troops by clicking in the reset button.Then take 2 tokens from each troop and adding them to your side of the table.Click the reset button on the bottom to refill and shuffle your bag.Each turn drag three pieces from your bag the hand (middle-bottom). If you don't have enough pieces press the rest button again after you dragged all the pieces you had on your bag to the hand.

First you need to decide who plays which side. Left is "Raven" right is "Wolf". After that choose which set of troops you want to use. You can either choose some preset combinations, a random assortment or manually select which ones you want to play. To manually select a troop, drag the corresponding cards into one of your square holders. Then put 2 tokens of each troop into your "BAG" holder.
At the start of each turn draw 3 tokens from your bag into your hand (holder at the bottom). Before you draw them the first time, press the "Refill" button, to shuffle and flip all tokens to the correct side.If you have less than 3 tokens in your bag, draw the remaining ones and then press the "Refill" button to refill your bag from your "DISCARD". Tokens already placed onto the board, won't be affected by the "Refill" button.
Example: if you have 2 tokens in your bag, drag those 2 into your hand, press "Refill" and draw one more token.

To discard a destroyed troop, put it in the round holder at the top of the board.

Wizard.Name: Wizard
Wizard.P1 L1: Discard 1 upgrade to move 1 extra tile.

Mounted Knight.Name: Horseman
Mounted Knight.P1 L1: Move up to 2 tiles and attack in a straight line.

Golen.Name: Golem
Golen.P1 L1: Can be summoned near any friendly troop.

Fenix.Name: Phoenix
Fenix.P1 L1: When killed, can be resurrected using 1 coin from the supply.
Fenix.P2 L1: Fly 2 tiles to defend one of your bases.

Necromancer.Name: Necromancer
Necromancer.P1 L1: After attacking or conquering base tile, draw 1 coin and use it immediately.

General.Name: General
General.P1 L1: Uses your coin to activate any friendly troop up to 2 tiles away from you.

Griffin.Name: Griffin
Griffin.P1 L1: Grab 1 friendly troop up to 2 tiles away and put it near you.

Centaur.Name: Centaur
Centaur.P1 L1: Attack the first troop up to 2 tiles away in a straight line.
Centaur.P2 L1: Can attack adjacent tiles using horse legs.

Minion.Name: Minion
Minion.P1 L1: Up to 2 minions can exist on the board at the same time.
Minion.P2 L1: Move all minions on the board

Giant.Name: Giant
Giant.P1 L1: Can only be damaged by upgraded troops.

Minotaur.Name: Minotaur
Minotaur.P1 L1: When attacked in close combat, retaliates with one damage.

instructions.text:
Instructions:

In your bag (holder next to "Refill") you should have 9 tokens, 2 from each troop plus 1 coin.

At the start of each turn draw 3 tokens from your bag into your hand (holder at the bottom). Before you draw them the first time, press the "Refill" button, to shuffle and flip all tokens to the correct side.
 If you have less than 3 tokens in your bag, draw the remaining ones and then press the "Refill" button to refill your bag from your "DISCARD". Tokens already placed onto the board, won't be affected by the "Refill" button.
Example: if you have 2 tokens in your bag, drag those 2 into your hand, press "Refill" and draw one more token.

To discard a destroyed troop, put it in the round holder at the top of the board.

fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?
You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?
